流言蜚語: (りゅうげんひご) - (yoji) false (wild, groundless) rumor (rumour); canard
流言飛語: (りゅうげんひご) - (yoji) false (wild, groundless) rumor (rumour); canard
流説: (るせつ) - groundless rumor; groundless rumour; false report
流路: (りゅうろ) - channel; duct; passage; watercourse; flow channel
流転生死: (るてんしょうじ) - (yoji) all things being in flux through the endless circle of birth, death, and rebirth; the circle of transmigration
流転輪廻: (るてんりんね) - (yoji) all things being in flux through the endless circle of birth, death, and rebirth; the circle of transmigration
流通: (りゅうつう) - circulation of money or goods/flow of water or air/distribution; negotiable (e.g. shares)
流通コスト: (りゅうつうコスト) - distribution cost
流通チャンネル: (りゅうつうチャンネル) - distribution channel
流通企業: (りゅうつうきぎょう) - retailer; retail company
流通機構: (りゅうつうきこう) - distribution system
流通経路: (りゅうつうけいろ) - distribution channel; channel of distribution
流通証券: (りゅうつうしょうけん) - negotiable securities
流通資本: (りゅうつうしほん) - circulating capital
流通革命: (りゅうつうかくめい) - distribution revolution
流速: (りゅうそく) - speed of moving fluid
流連荒亡: (りゅうれんこうぼう) - (yoji) spending all one's time in idle amusement away from home; being absorbed in self-indulgent pleasures
流量: (りゅうりょう) - flow rate (esp. water or electricity); quantity of flow; capacity (of output or throughput per unit time)
流量計: (りゅうりょうけい) - flow meter (liquid); current meter (electricity)
流離: (りゅうり) - wandering (e.g. bird, exile, lifestyle); wandering alone in a strange country
流離う: (さすらう) - to wander; to roam
浄める: (きよめる) - to purify; to cleanse; to exorcise; to purge; to ward off
浄写: (じょうしゃ) - clean or fair copy
浄化槽: (じょうかそう) - septic tank; tank for purifying water
浄土: (じょうど) - Pure Land (esp. the Western Pure Land paradise of Amitabha); Pure Land Buddhism
浄土三部経: (じょうどさんぶきょう) - three major sutras of Pure Land Buddhism
浄土宗: (じょうどしゅう) - Pure Land sect (of Buddhism); Jodo (sect)
浄土教: (じょうどきょう) - Pure Land teachings
浄土真宗: (じょうどしんしゅう) - Jodo Shinshu (offshoot of the Jodo sect)
浄御原令: (きよみはらりょう) - Asuka Kiyomihara Code (689 CE)
浄水器: (じょうすいき) - water filter; water purification system
浄水場: (じょうすいじょう) - water purification (filtering) plant
浄玻璃: (じょうはり) - fine crystal/clear glass; mirror found in hell in Enma's chamber that allows people to see their good and bad deeds
浄玻璃の鏡: (じょうはりのかがみ) - mirror found in hell in Enma's chamber that allows people to see their good and bad deeds
浄瑠璃語: (じょうるりかたり) - joruri reciter
浄瑠璃語り: (じょうるりかたり) - joruri reciter
浄界: (じょうかい) - sacred ground; the Pure Land
浄衣: (じょうえ) - white robe or costume
浅い: (asai) - raso, superficial; leve (ferida), leve (sono), pálido (cor), inadequado (conhecimento); curto (tempo), cedo, jovem
浅からぬ: (あさからぬ) - deep (of emotions, connections, etc.)
浅はか: (asahaka) - superficial, leviano, despreocupado, míope, tolo, bobo
浅ましい: (あさましい) - wretched; miserable; shameful; mean; despicable; abject
浅墓: (あさはか) - shallow; superficial; frivolous; thoughtless; foolish; silly
浅学寡聞: (せんがくかぶん) - (yoji) shallow learning and limited information; ignorant and badly informed
浅学菲才: (せんがくひさい) - (yoji) one's lack of learning or ability; shallow learning and limited ability
浅学非才: (せんがくひさい) - (yoji) one's lack of learning or ability; shallow learning and limited ability
浅履: (あさぐつ) - shallow clogs (worn by nobles; originally made of leather, later made of black lacquered paulownia)
浅才: (せんさい) - incompetence; lack of ability
浅木: (あさっき) - crude wood (i.e. with many knots)
浅木炭: (あさぎずみ) - low-grade charcoal made from crude wood
浅沓: (あさぐつ) - shallow clogs (worn by nobles; originally made of leather, later made of black lacquered paulownia)
浅漬大根: (あさづけだいこん) - half-dried daikon, salted and picked in koji
浅瀬: (あさせ) - shoal; shallows; sand bar; ford
浅瀬に仇波: (あさせにあだなみ) - deep rivers move in silence; shallow brooks are noisy; those who know little talk much
浅発地震: (せんぱつじしん) - shallow earthquake; shallow-focus earthquake
浅知恵: (あさぢえ) - shallow thinking; shallow wit
浅茅: (あさぢ) - (often used in literature as an example of a bleak landscape)  sparsely growing cogon grass; short cogon grass
浅茅生: (あさじう) - broad field of sparsely growing cogon grass
浅草海苔: (アサクサノリ) - Porphyra tenera (species of edible seaweed); dried nori/dried laver
浅葱斑: (アサギマダラ) - chestnut tiger butterfly (Parantica sita)
